> Subject: Picture from Aizu Festival!!!!
> 
> You guys!! Tama just sent me a pic she took with her
> cell phone of the
> parade featuring NHK Hijikata Koji Yamamoto it's in
> the photos section
> in the first file = Aizu Festival


It was very nice ^^ Though I arrived a bit late and
missed the homage to the deceased and the bow
shooting, I managed to see the Byakkotai kenbu, the
cannon shooting and the beginning of the parade. Lots
of women trying to take pictures and touching the
three NHK dorama actors who took part in the parade :D


The parade itself had fewer people than I had
expected. But it was great nonetheless.

I couldn't take many pictures (most were blurred -_-).
Perhaps Tama-san was able to get better pictures than
I. I am trying to upload three pictures I took from
the parade in the Photos section. They are a bit heavy
(about 750k each), so be warned. 

This Saturday, I intend to go to Saito Hajime's
memorial service, which will be held at his grave.


Serizawa Kamo
